alerts.description:
The expected weather will bring a situation of extreme heat stress. (level 3 of 3)
Height range: < 400 m

The expected weather will bring a situation of strong heat stress. (level 1 of 3)
Height range: < 800 m

alerts.event: heavy thunderstorms with gale- or storm-force gusts, heavy rain and hail
alerts.description:
There is a risk of heavy thunderstorms with gale- or storm-force gusts, heavy rain and hail (level 2 of 4).
Approaching from: west; Max. gusts: ~ 70 km/h; Precipitation amounts: < 25 l/m²/1h; Hail: small grains
